attributes.action: Eastern Europeans who aren't actively finding work in their country or in the uk shouldn't be allowed to come or stay in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Mass amounts of Immigration has become ridiculous. The country is cutting back, if immigration is increasing it is going to pit pressure on the welfare bill and other White Hall departments.
I call on the government not to allow Eastern European's into Britain if they aren't actively trying to find work in their own country's. Those who have entered and who are not finding work actively and are straining government resources due to this should not be allowed residence in the UK.
